description:
Shion Kiba`s next opponent is none other than the one who defeated Tokoha Anjou on the second day, Taiyou Asukawa. The battle of the two paladins for their friendship and their team begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kishi wa Tsurugi ni Shouri o Chikau
The Knights Swear Victory Upon Their Swords
騎士は剣[つるぎ]に勝利を誓う
